text:
JuliaData is primarily (but not exclusively) concerned with tabular data.
JuliaIO is concerned with loading and savings all formats.
HDF5 is nontabular so seems no strong argument to move.
It could join the handful of nontabular formats in JuliaData but I don't see a reason why it should

text: HDF5 does have a table interface
